name: taobao.alitrip.it.fare.get
apiChineseName: 【国际机票自有政策】单条查询
description: 通过此接口可以查询单条政策的详情，可以根据fareId或outId查询，用户outId查询时，如果outId不唯一，只返回最新添加的一条数据

requestParams.name: extendAttributes
requestParams.description: json格式的字符串，扩展属性，预留

requestParams.name: fareId
requestParams.description: 运价id，单条新增成功时返回运价id，fareId和outId必填一个，fareId优先

requestParams.name: outId
requestParams.description: 外部id，为新增时请求参数中的外部政策id

responseParams.name: extend_attributes
responseParams.description: json格式的字符串，扩展属性，预留

responseParams.name: fare_json
responseParams.description: 自有政策json序列化后字符串，具体属性和addow或addrt接口的请求参数一致，如：{"ticketingAirline":"CA","saleAirline":"CA","addressOption":"城市","tripType":"直达","originLand":"SHA,BJS","destination":"HKG,SHA","cabin":"N","restrictFlightNo":"","excludeFlightNo":"","validDate4Dep":"2015-05-30~2015-11-30","flightDateRestrict4Dep":"12","saleDate":"2015-05-30~2015-11-30","adultPassengerIdentity":"普通","ticketPrice":2000,"childPrice":"1980","returnPoint":1.0,"adjustMoney":0,"refundRule":"收取80000元退票费","reissueRule":"收取20%改期费","noshowRule":"起飞前不得退票，不得改期","luggageRule":"逾重行李费用为每公斤100元"}
